role: Audit dashboard project (EXCEPT coderef-core/). Report all discrepancies and new resources. NOTE: This is Phase 1 audit only. Phase 2/3 implementation will be handled by separate agent working directly in resources folder.

context.problem: CSV is static and manually maintained. No guarantee it stays synchronized with actual ecosystem resources. Dashboard pages inconsistently organized.
context.solution: Phase 1: Audit dashboard. Phase 2: Automated CSV integration. Phase 3: Dynamic dashboard + standardized page structure.
context.impact: CSV becomes living document, automatically maintained, serves as definitive source of truth for entire ecosystem.

execution_steps.step_1: READ resources/index.md to access CSV, known issues, and session documents
execution_steps.step_3: Execute Task 1: Scan packages/dashboard/ for all resources (EXCEPT coderef-core/)
execution_steps.step_4: Execute Task 2: Compare findings against CSV
execution_steps.step_5: Execute Task 3: Document discrepancies (verify known issues + discover new ones)
execution_steps.step_6: Execute Task 4: Create comprehensive audit report in outputs/
execution_steps.step_7: UPDATE communication.json after EACH task completion
execution_steps.step_8: VALIDATE phase gate criteria before marking complete

task_1.description: Scan packages/dashboard/ for all resources (commands, scripts, tabs, pages, components)

implementation.method: Use existing build-source-of-truth.py script with dashboard-specific paths

task_1.validation: Scanned resources list matches actual project structure

identify: Resources in CSV but not in project (outdated)
Resources in project but not in CSV (missing)
Resources with incorrect metadata (category, description, path)

task_2.validation: Discrepancies documented with current vs actual values

structure.discrepancies: Array of {type, resource_name, current_csv_value, actual_value, recommendation}
structure.new_resources: Array of {type, name, description, path, server, category}

task_3.validation: All discrepancies have recommendations, all new resources have complete metadata

success_criteria.audit_completeness: All dashboard resources scanned and compared against CSV
success_criteria.known_issues_verification: All known issues (timestamps, UI integration, hardcoded data) verified
success_criteria.new_discoveries: Any new discrepancies documented with recommendations

phase_gate_checklist: Known issues verified (timestamps, UI integration, hardcoded data)
handoff_note: After Phase 1 complete, this audit report will be used by: (1) Orchestrator to synthesize findings, (2) coderef-docs agent to integrate into CSV (Phase 2), (3) Resources Page Agent working directly in ~/Desktop/coderef-dashboard/packages/dashboard/src/app/resources to implement dynamic dashboard (Phase 3).
